channel.title: CVE Feed for WECON -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WECON -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42705|2024-08-04T03:38:49.605Z -- wecon -- plc%20editor
item.description: PLC Editor Versions 1.3.8 and prior is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow while processing project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-42707|2024-08-04T03:38:49.451Z -- wecon -- plc%20editor
item.description: PLC Editor Versions 1.3.8 and prior is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write while processing project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-43983|2024-08-04T04:10:17.169Z -- wecon -- levistudiou
item.description: WECON LeviStudioU Versions 2019-09-21 and prior are vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflow instances while parsing project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
